definition: To arrive safely and gently on the ground after being in the air, typically referring to the descent of an aircraft or a spacecraft.

examples.english: I will land in Berlin tomorrow.

examples.german: Das Flugzeug landete sicher auf der Landebahn.
examples.english: The airplane landed safely on the runway.
The ball landed in the goal.

examples.german: Die Rakete landete auf dem Mond.
examples.english: The rocket landed on the moon.
